title: The Power Of The Soil | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: The Power Of The Soil | Joel Osteen
description:
Like a seed needs good soil to grow, you need a healthy environment to become who God created you to be. When you choose the right friendships and mindsets, your gifts and talents will flourish. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
